title: VEGA-F002 Reclassification & G4 Unfreeze Authorization

executive_determination.ruling: The 500ms p95 latency threshold defined for IoS-008 applies only to TTL-coupled decisioning components
basis: R4 (VEGA) is governance/epistemic oversight, not decisioning critical path
R4 latency does not impact DecisionPlan TTL validity
executive_determination.principle: Reclassification based on architectural fact, not risk tolerance

finding_reclassification.rationale: R4 (VEGA Epistemic Integrity Monitor) is not on IoS-008 critical path and is not TTL-coupled to decisioning

updated_performance_policy.vega_responsibility: Continue to record and report latency metrics for all daemons

constraints: Subject to existing ADR-012 economic gates
No execution, capital exposure, or strategy activation beyond existing approvals implied

vega_shall: Retain original metrics for historical integrity

closing_statement: No standards are weakened. One incorrect coupling assumption is removed.
